sentences.en: a fictional account of life on a desert island
sentences.cn: 对荒岛生活的虚构描述

sentences.en: Albeit fictional, she seemed to have resolved the problem.
sentences.cn: 虽然是虚构的, 但是在她看来好象是解决了问题.

sentences.en: All the characters in his novel are fictional.
sentences.cn: 他的小说里的所有人物都是虚构的.

sentences.en: Almost all fictional detectives are unreal.
sentences.cn: 几乎所有小说中的侦探都是虚构的。

sentences.en: Disclaimer : All the statement of this post is consider as fictional.
sentences.cn: 免责条款︰此文章之所有内容应被视作虚构.

sentences.en: Gordon: Did you finish that fictional book about Area 51?
sentences.cn: 戈登: 你看完那本关于51区的虚构故事了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He embellished his account with fictional details.
sentences.cn: 他以种种虚构的细节来渲染他的叙述.

sentences.en: He has created many lively fictional characters with his wonderful writing.
sentences.cn: 他的神笔之下曾塑造了很多栩栩如生的小说人物.

sentences.en: His novels are largely autobiographical, ie though fictional they describe many of his own experiences.
sentences.cn: 他的小说大多是自传式的(即虽属虚构,但却描述许多亲身经历).

sentences.en: However , too much fictional, idiosyncratic biography is a distraction and makes your personas less credible.
sentences.cn: 过多的虚构特质的描述,不仅是一种干扰,而且使得你的人物角色的可信度降低.

sentences.en: Innumerable connotations are implied underneath Hemingway's concise fictional words.
sentences.cn: 在海明威小说文字所显露的冰山一角之下蕴藏着丰富的内涵.

sentences.en: It is drama featuring fictional characters.
sentences.cn: 这部戏剧中的人物是虚构的。

sentences.en: The names of the shops are entirely fictional.
sentences.cn: 那些商店的名字完全是虚构的.

sentences.en: The novel is set in the fictional German town of Kreiswald.
sentences.cn: 这部小说以虚构的德国小镇克赖斯瓦尔德为背景。

sentences.en: This story is purely fictional. Any similarity is purely coincidental.
sentences.cn: 总的来说,是个哲理故事.

words.tran_cn: 虚构的；假想的；编造的；假装的
虚构的；想象上的；虚伪的

trans.tran_en: fictional people, events etc are imaginary and from a book or story
